description.value: Disobeying your @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Iron Command] has lasting consequences. If an enemy refuses to kneel to you, you can deal @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Mental Damage} instead of normal mental damage. You must decide whether the mental damage will be persistent before your enemy chooses whether to kneel or not. The amount of damage is unchanged.
